turns.speaker: Speaker 1
turns.text: The stale smell of old beer lingers.

turns.speaker: Speaker 2
turns.text: It takes heat to bring out the odor.

turns.speaker: Speaker 1
turns.text: A cold dip restores health and zest.

turns.speaker: Speaker 2
turns.text: A salt pickle tastes fine with ham.

turns.speaker: Speaker 1
turns.text: Tacos al pastor are my favorite.

turns.speaker: Speaker 2
turns.text: A zestful food is the hot cross bun.
